children.author: gerrorist
children.comment: holy shit, stfu you insufferable pedantic dorklord.
that doesn't mean you can re-define words to suit yourself.if we aren't agreeing on meaning of words we may as well just moo at each other.
I did look it up to double check, and the definition applied to my situation and that of many others. It's extremely distressing and harmful
your logic is impeccable, ever consider politics?  you could just try looking up the word in a dictionary.
Maybe it's not accurate for you, but it is for many people, and your experience does not invalidate ours. Perhaps mine is more severe, IDK.
i have anxiety. i don't suffer. therefore it's not an accurate description. not all anxiety is suffering, it's clearly not accurate at all.
Wow, you're a pleasant one. I never said I'm a victim. What word did I redefine?
you sound like a whiny bitch..wwooahh, i'm a victim.. woaaahhh. so much so you're willing to change the meaning of words to suit yourself.
As a person with anxiety, "suffer" is an accurate descriptor.
